import React from 'react' import { ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CartItem from './CartItem'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { cartUiActions } from "../../../store/shopping-cart/cartUiSlice"; import '../../../styles/shopping-cart.css'; const Cart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cartProducts = useSelector return
Subtotal amount: $123
} export default Cart;
